sourcesContent:
Metamask Wallet connected!

Account address: {{ wallet.address }}

Account balance: {{ wallet.balance }}

No Metamask Wallet found. Please use the button on the top right to connect to your Wallet!

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { MetamaskWallet } from 'src/app/core/models/metamask-wallet.models'; import { MetamaskWalletService } from 'src/app/core/services/metamask-wallet/metamask-wallet.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { public readonly metamaskWallet$: Observable; constructor(private metamaskWalletService: MetamaskWalletService) { this.metamaskWallet$ = this.metamaskWalletService.metamaskWallet; } }
